inn1.comm: pitched short and angles across the left hander with good carry through to the keeper
good length with movement away from the left-hander after pitching outside off, Dhawan lets it go
better line, Roach keeps it close to off, making Dhawan push at it, the ball seams away from the batsman and beats the edge
86mph but a bit too wide outside off to make Dhawan play
Dhawan gets going by glancing one off his pads towards fine leg
played off the back foot towards point
too full and  too straight, Parthiv stays in his crease and clips the ball through square
76.5mph, good length on off stump, defended towards cover
Parthiv works another one that is too straight off his hips behind square
Dhawan pushes forward and tries to drive, he gets beaten by the line going across him
driven through covers for two runs
too full and Dhawan meets the ball on the front foot and drives with a straight bat past the bowler, top shot
short of a length delivery rises on Parthiv, who jumps back and lets it go
that's too short and too wide outside off, the first extra of the day
that would have been out had there been a direct hit at the bowler's end, Patel pushed the ball towards extra cover and set off, Simmons missed
another short ball which the batsman avoids
Dhawan gets into a tangle as he tries to defend, he begins to run but then realises the ball is trickling back towards his stumps, he goes back to stop it
played off the back foot with an open face behind point

edged to the third man boundary past the leaping Darren Sammy at gully, Andre Russell pulls off a diving save on the boundary. Parthiv jumped on the back foot to fend at a short ball and got a thick edge
good length on leg and middle, Parthiv defends on the leg side
defended from the crease back to the bowler
short of a length and straight, bowling at 82 mph and giving no room, the batsman is forced to play from his crease on the off side

Martin's taken a stunner! Parthiv tried to pull the short ball but didn't connect well, hitting the ball in the air just outside the circle in front of square. Martin sprinted back from square leg, watching the ball over his shoulder and then dived full length to latch on to the ball
another bouncer, Dhawan sways out of the way of that one
keeps it on the shorter side, on the pads, tucked towards sqquare leg
short of length ball on offstump, poked towards cover by Dhawan, who then sets off for a single only to see Kohli isn't interested, Dhawan beats the throw to make his ground
Kohli plays from the crease, a short of length ball just outside off, defended towards backward point
keeps it short, on middle stump, defended off the back foot towards point
quick ball rising outside off, Dhawan is hurried by that
gets back in the crease and opens the face of the bat to guide the ball towards backward point, where a diving Pollard cuts off any chance of a run
a bouncer outside off, easy leave
a strange shot from Dhawan, looks to cut a length ball but can't get bat on ball
Russell sends this at 85mph outside off, left alone
another delivery outside off, Kohli happy to allow it to the keeper
stands tall and jabs this one towards backward point
fuller from Russell, on the pads as well, defended down the track by Dhawan

superb save from Pollard, but he can't get a direct hit that could have had Dhawan in trouble, Dhawan stood tall and slashed the ball powerfully towards backward point where a diving Pollard stops the ball, then throws at the non-striker's end, nearly catching out Dhawan who was scrambling for the single
another tight over from West Indies, the final delivery was just outside off and was left alone
an awkward defensive shot from Dhawan, who moves beyond legstump as he tries to play that short ball, then defends flat-batted down the track

is that a wicket? West Indies seem confident that Dhawan has spooned a catch to slip, it was a full ball just outside off, replays show that Dhawan had squeezed the ball on to the ground before it flew to slip, he lives on
Dhawan not in the most convincing form here, he was looking to whip that through the leg side, but the leading edge sends it flying towards point
mistimes the drives towards midwicket
fullish and on the pads, inside-edge on to the pads and the ball trickles to the leg side

Dhawan's troubled stay is over, another shortish one from Roach, Dhawan goes for the cut but top-edges the ball to first slip, he was really struggling out there, Roach has been cranking up the pace in the over, all the deliveries around 88mph or more
sharply rising 85mph delivery from Russell, Kohli jumps as he looks to avoid that ball which sails past him to the keeper
a more confident forward defensive from Kohli, Russell pitched it up this time
overpitched and on the pads, there haven't been too many of those errors from the WI bowlers today, Kohli pounces on this one, whips it to the midwicket boundary
gets a nice stride in as he punches the ball towards cover

big appeal from Russell, Kohli survives, that looked to be going over the top, it was a length ball that nipped in and hit Kohli well above the knee roll, replays show that the ball would have hit the top end of legstump
stands tall and defends to the off side
Tiwary gets an easy delivery first up, on the pads and it is helped along towards fine leg
gets well forwards as he defends it behind square
thick outside edge,fortunately for Kohli it flew between gully and point
down the leg side
Tiwary drops his arms as he looks to avoid a short ball from Roach, off the forearm and towards point, Lendl Simmons puts in a full-length dive thinking its a catch but doesn't get to the ball
lovely shot to end the over, punched to the right of the bowler for a boundary
shortish ball angling in, blocked off the backfoot towards the bowler
Tiwary gets off the strike as he drops the ball to the off side and the Indians smartly pinch a single
Kohli clips this one towards the square leg boundary, he doesn't get a run as Martin ounces on to the ball
length ball on the pads, easy pickings for Kohli who glances it down to fine leg
short ball down the leg side, and that has been called a wide
tucks this one towards midwicket, more sharp running from India and this time Martin can't stop the single
bouncer which sails over the batsman's head, that is very high and that is called a no-ball
this time Russell gets it right, on a length and heading for off and middle, defended down the track
short of length and well outside off, guided towards backward point
defended to the leg side by Kohli
fuller one from Sammy, blocked back towards the bowler
another big stride in from Kohli as he blocks the ball to the off side
a boundary for Kohli but not very convincing, he looks for a flamboyant on-the-up drive through off, gets the outside edge which flies past the vacant second slip for four
plays the length ball with an angled bat, no attempt to power the ball this time, just placed towards point for a single
well outside off, guided down to third man for a single, not much footwork from Kohli as he plays that stroke
Tiwary gets forward and guides the ball towards backward point before taking a quick single
length ball outside off, helped towards third man for a easy single
the 50 comes up as Pollard sprays the ball down the leg side, easily put away to the fine leg boundary
very wide outside off, Tiwary reaches out to that and sends the ball towards third man
third man remains busy as Kohli steers the final ball of the over to the same region
more work for third man, Kohli opens the face to send the ball towards the boundary for a single
full and outside off, batsman raises the bat over his head as he leaves the ball to the keeper
Tiwary has a close shave, he looks to whip the ball from offstump towards the leg stump, gets an edge that flies over the slip for a single, Tiwary fights on
short of length and well outside off, chopped towards third man, to the fielder's right this time
watchfully left alone outside off by Tiwary
an offstump delivery is defended off the front foot to the off side
Kohli was in two minds whether to play that or not, a shortish ball that bounce extra, just outside off stump, Kohli finally leaves that one
blocked towards the off side off the front foot, not very convincing from Kohli
short of length ball just outside off, solidly defended off the front foot towards point
length ball on offstump, carefully defended to the off side
short of length ball angling in towards off, defended back down the track
overpitched on the pads, tapped towards deep square leg for a single to end the over
hullo, where did that come from, overpitched on the pads, smashes the ball from outside off over midwicket and onto the roof of the stand beyond, Tiwary enjoyed that one
way outside off stump, left alone
length ball on middle, defended towards midwicket for a single
once more on legstump, pushed towards mid-on for an easy single
short and outside off, batsman looks to pull that one but gets something of a top edge, loops towards square leg for a single
the 50 partnership comes up with a crunching drive from Kohli, he wasn't up to the pitch of that ball but he threw his bat at it and send it racing through cover
much less violence from Kohli, opens the face to send it towards third man
a length ball on offstump, off the inside half of the bat towards midwicket
short ball on legstump, slapped down to fine leg by Tiwary after he moves across the stumps
solid forward defensive from Kohli, it was a length ball outside off
on the pads once more, another easy run, this is whipped towards deep midwicket
too far outside off, and that is too wide, extra count keeps rising
Tiwary moves on to 22 by punching a length ball outside off through cover for a couple

Tiwary is gone! a length ball outside off, Tiwary opens the face to glide the ball to third man, gets a thin edge which Baugh pouches and jumps in glee, Tiwary seemed to be settling in nicely and making the most of his opportunity but he has gone after stabilising the innings
Kohli pushes the ball back towards the bowler
Kohli moves away from the legstump and defends the ball towards off side
looks to defend and is beaten by that, hit on the pad but that was going down leg side
blocked to the off side
good start from Martin, punched towards mid-off to complete a maiden
shuffles across and gets bat in front of pad to work a length ball in front of square leg
gets some extra bounce outside off, and Virat is beaten as he goes for a cut
very full but angled in around leg stump and allows him to clip it through vacant midwicket for a single
very short, very wide outside off and he is not going to go after that, shoulders arms
languidly done by Rohit, shuffles across, gets outside the line of one angled in and flicks through midwicket
and now its Virat, getting front foot across and tucking it, this time towards square leg
again that bounce, but this time he does not look to cut, allows it to come one and guides it to third man
flatter delivery and driven with the turn to long off
straightening from middle stump, he goes back and works it towards square leg
gets forward and smothers the turn on a tossed up ball
there he is driving away from the body, lured forward by the flight on this one, well bowled, but too wide of the bowler for him to have a chance
gets a bit inside the line of one turning away to push away to short extra cover
tries to play that whip-drive through extra cover but finds that man at short extra in the way
lots of width outside off stump and helped away to third man for a single
pulls out that whiplash flick-drive through midwicket off a fuller one
a touch slower this one, he gets forward and plays out to midwicket
poor ball from Pollard, low full toss on the pads and he gleefully nudges it to easily beat long leg
invites him to drive with a very full length close to off stump, and he bends the knee to get it through covers and the man on the boundary tidies up
walks inside the line and works a back of a length ball behind square leg
pushes forward with the turn and gets it past a diving extra cover
looking to push forward with the turn, checks the shot to play it towards short extra cover
superb shot from Virat, saw that the length was juts a bit short, it hurried on close to off, but Kohli was prepared, rocked back and cut it with tremendous bat speed past backward point
takes it on the pads as Martin fires one in, going down leg though
shortish and turning away, he goes back, there is some bounce on it and he gets on top to push it to point's right
gets an inside edge that is in the air for some time on the leg side as he pushes forward, no one close in though
appeal for leg before, that looked close, shuffling across a long way as he tries to flick through square leg but the ball was bowled from wide of the crease and would have missed leg

simple run out chance missed, Barath it is at mid off, with the non-striker stranded halfway down the track, he only has to lob the ball back to Russell who was close to the stumps but he goes for the direct hit and misses, Rohit had driven the ball in the air to BArath;s left and Virat had set off for the run
short of a length and climbing in to him, he brings it down
driven wide of extra cover for a single
Virat is eager for every run, but there is none this time, plonks the ball in front of point and sets off before getting back
stays in the crease to one angled in, even as it ends on the pads he works it away to long leg for the single
gets forward to a tossed up ball and pushes it away on the off side
lovely shot from Virat, he takes two steps towards a full toss tossed up around middle and leg and whip-drives it inside out through extra cover, beats long off comfortably
flatter one and he cannot get it away
pushed away in front of point for yet another half-century, well played
has him reaching out again with that flight, he looked to work it against the turn from leg stump, but got a leading edge on the off side
driven along the ground towards short extra cover off the front foot
takes on the short ball into the body, swivels and pulls hard down to long leg
this one is some way outside off and is slapped away to sweeper cover
another boundary for Virat, full toss around off and he stays in the crease and pings the deep extra cover boundary
gets better all the time, shuffling outside the line and picking up a couple with a flick that beats midwicket
short ball, does not get up much, he shuffles and helps it away backward of square leg
bounce this time for Russell, Rohit uses it to steer for a single to third man
Rohit with that lofted drive over extra cover, did not time it too well to beat the slow outfield near the boundary, and sweeper cover is able to get around it
another drive, this time along the ground but with the turn all the time, two more wide of sweeper cover
a touch flat, a touch short, he waits and punches, again to sweeper cover
gets forward and drives along the ground to long off
reaches well forward, not to the pitch and pushes towards the bowler
misses out now, it was a bit short and turning away, Rohit got back and was in position to dispatch it wide of extra cover but it hit it straight to that man
starting wide outside off and moving away in the air further, he stretches towards it but finds extra cover
straighter ball around middle and worked on the leg side
wants to punch for the single to long on but does not time it well and midwicket will cut it off
he will get the run now, got forward and pushed past midwicket to long on
lovely work from Virat, he waits in the crease, allowing the length ball to come on and opens the face very late, and the ball gathers pace and lures short third man all the way in to the boundary
worked away this time through square leg
that lofted inside out shot does not come off well this time and he gets it on the bounce to long off
goes for a drive from the crease to a ball that was fuller and it took the edge to run away to short third man
gets off strike by reaching out and pushing one down to long on
going straight on with the angle, down the pads and flicked away to long leg
another one hurries straight on, this one was headed for the stumps, he got back and thumped the cut towards point
can;t beat the infield again, rocks back and looks to hit it past extra cover, Martin takes pace off it with a dive and extra cover fields in the end
edge this time, but no luck for Windies, stood and slashed, and there is a slope in the direction of third man and the man inside the circle had no chance
slanted wide down the leg side, Baugh with those fast hands has the bails off in a flash
fuller ball around off, he gets to the pitch and drives through extra cover
gets beside the line and drives a length ball through covers for another single
checks the shot, gets forward and pushes it back to the bowler
yipe, a slower one gone wrong, high loopy full toss way outside off, Virat is so surprised he can do nothing with it
good work from Martin at point saves a single
drives with the turn wide of sweeper cover
leans forward and pushes towards midwicket
looks to come down the track, he drops it a but short and he pushes it back to the bowler
this one is smashed off the back foot but Roach gets around to it at sweeper cover
pushed away towards covers
plays this one out on the off side
that slower loopy full toss from Simmons he gets to it and drives to sweeper cover
pushed back towards the bowler
tries to dab it towards point but there is a man there and Rohit has to get back quickly
gets forward to a length ball and gives long on some throwing practice with a push to him
angled in and he whips it off the hip in front of square leg
whip-drives off the front foot but straight to extra cover
flat ball but lots of turn on it from around middle and leg, a surprised batsman plays it away towards the non-striker
stays back to one darted in and picks up a single in front of square leg
pushed away off the back foot to extra cover
tight line this time and he can only push it back to the bowler
Rohit is getting a touch impatient, looks to slog this fuller one but finds midwicket, he is not happy at the effort
finally gets one away, a shortish ball dispatched to sweeper cover
lots of width but his languid drive cannot beat sweeper cover who cuts it off
now he bowls it on the pads and is picked away backward of square leg
on the pads once again, easy stuff for the batsman, just had to nudge it behind square
that slow full toss again, he does not attack it and drives along the ground to sweeper cover
Virat looks to force a full delivery through midwicket but gets it down to long on
tucked away towards square leg off the pads, seven runs and no one broke a sweat
gentle delivery on the pads and it is worked to deep square leg
another one tucked away through square leg where there is only the umpire
carved away through cover for another single, looking in total control at the moment this pair
gets forward to a fuller ball and finds long off with a drive
nicely played, the short ball gets big on him, he moves uses the wrists to keep the pull down towards deep square leg
there is a man backward of square leg, but another single is pinched in front of him
angles it in full from wide of the crease and is whipped to long leg off the pads
low full toss, he reaches out but gets the drive off the bottom part of the bat and it rolls away to extra cover
eep, what was that, Rohit walks a step or two down the track and launches it in to a wild swing missing the back of a length ball by iles
another short of a length ball, he pays it lot more respect this time and drops it on the leg side for a run
now Virat tries to drop-and-run, but point is quickly on to the ball and he has to rush back
rising furious short of a length ball but some way outside off, he rides the bounce and opens the face to get a single to third man
bangs in the bouncer as he sees Kohli take a step out but it goes way over the batsman's head
gets outside the line of one angled in and picks up the single towards square leg
bowled short of a length and moves away a touch, but it is too far outside off
in the air but well past the bowler as Rohit gets forward and lazily pushes at a length ball
wide delivery and he cashes in happily, reaches out and slices it way over point and in to the boundary
lovely shot, walks towards the ball and unfurls a drive to long off
worked away off the pads but right to midwicket
another one on the pads and helped through midwicket, these two looking in no trouble at all
smack! Rohit takes off, takes a step towards the pitch of a length ball and slams it over mid off, nice swing and good connection
shuffles outside the line and works it away backward of square leg
gets on top of a short ball and tucks it towards square leg, the region has been unmanned today mostly and by the time Baugh gets there, they have two
midwicket tries to cut off Virat's push with a big dive but the ball scoots past him to long on
stays in the crease, hops  and whips a back of a length ball wide of long leg

there is going to be no century for Virat Kohli, he tried to come back for the second after another work off the pad towards deep square leg, but was caught short by an accurate throw from the deep, Ronnie Sarwan it is, Baugh makes no mistake in collecting and breaking the stumps, that looked like the only way he could have got out today
steered away to third man for a single
there is the short ball, ho hum, Raina gets down underneath it early
Raina walks across the stumps, expecting the short ball, but it back of a length outside off and he ends up having a poke at it, beaten
gets the fuller length to drive but finds extra cover as well

and for the umpteenth time this series Suresh Raina throws it away, length ball going across him, and what does he do, he goes for the ambitious on-the-knee lofted swipe over extra cover and it loops tamely to the man in the deep, was not close to the line of the ball but went ahead with the shot
fires it in around the blockhole, Rohit digs it back to Pollard and then gets out of the way as the big man threatens to throw it back
dug in short but it moves in down the leg side, appeal for a catch by Baugh, Yusuf was not even close to the ball
they are testing him with the bouncer, banged in short and YK is surprised and goes down hurriedly, manages to get away
back of a length and going in, he shuffles across to pick up a single towards long leg
now Rohit shuffles across, they have done this all day today, and got away, tucked away to long leg again
is a tad late coming forward after that bouncer, and is beaten by a length ball that zips past the outside edge, excellent stuff from Roach
gets forward sooner now and pushes down to long on for a single
squared up this time, length ball that he looked to initially go leg side with, but it was not as straight and he got an outside edge to point
very slowly bowled, he picked it up late and could only block it down the track
width on this back of a length ball and he steers it to third man
pushes forward and gets it in the air for a while towards point
Rohit gets forward uncertainly and gets a thick edge as he stabs at a length ball some way outside off
again Pollard pegs him in the crease with a bouncer, YK has nothing to do with it and gets underneath it
slashes a wide ball, in the air for a while but no harm done as it goes down to third man
length ball on offstump, defended off the front foot to the off side
the famous Yusuf heave makes an appearance, he smashes a length ball from outside off towards wide long-on for  a boundary
a short ball that takes off, keeper is standing up to the stumps, he jumps to try collect it but can't, some free runs for India
outside off and that is left alone by Yusuf
pushes towards mid-on for a tight single
calmly driven by Rohit towards long-on for a single, that was slightly overpitched

on the thigh pads, tucked behind square leg for a single, hang on there's an overthrow as well, the fielder whips the ball towards the bowler, who has a tough take, Simmons can't pick it up and an extra run for India
length ball heading for middle, Rohit gets in a big stride as he blocks that ball towards midwicket
once more helped to midwicket, no run again
down the leg side, Rohit looks to send that to fine leg but can't connect, was some pad on that perhaps, else that was a wide
just a bit of width, Rohit backs away to make more room, slaps the ball towards point
very close to offstump, Pathan tries to cut it deftly but can't beat short third
on middle and leg, turned behind square leg for a single to end a quiet over
Yusuf tries to drop the ball to the off side, short of length ball that rises outside off, beats the outside edge
this time Pathan connects, opens the face to guide the ball to short third man
outside off, Rohit drives beautifully towards cover to take the single that brings up his half-century
comes in strongly after pitching short of a length outside off, Yusuf was handcuffed by the movement, flies off the gloves and over the vacant slip
tight around off, blocked towards point
a full toss on legstump, whipped towards square leg for a single
gets forward and drives the ball towards wide mid-on
down the leg side, Yusuf looks to sweep but can't connect
moves across the stumps and looks to sweep again, not the best connection, flies towards short fine
clipped towards square leg by Rohit
moves across the stumps and clips the ball behind square leg
Rohit skips away from the stumps and lofts the length ball over point for four, Simmons has a long chase and just beats the fielder who crashes into the advertising hoardings

Martin strikes, Rohit is gone, he gets down on one knee and looks to smash the ball out of the ground, he misses and Martin has got a wicket off the final ball of his spell, another wicket for the batting Powerplay
another familiar Yusuf shot, a short ball outside off, Yusuf stands tall and guides the ball over the keeper's head for a boundary, he has shown many a time that's he's not just a brute-force batsman
jags in towards Yusuf, who manages to squeeze the ball towards backward point
on the pads this time, guided towards short fine leg by Yusuf

length ball on offstump, Ashwin taps the ball towards point and sets off for a single, Barath is quickly on to the ball and throws at the stumps as Ashwin tries to scramble back, Barath misses and gives away an overthrow
worked away behind backward point by Yusuf
another botched bit of running, Ashwin pushed the ball towards midwicket, slightly uppish, Yusuf wants one but is sent back and has to dive to make his ground, the throw is just wide
six for Yusuf, a short ball on legstump, sits up for Yusuf who pulls that behind square leg for a six, there was no one at deep backward square leg
goes for another swipe, too-edged and the ball flies towards midwicket and lands safe
nicely done by Ashwin, he just opens the face and guides the ball past the keeper and wide of a diving third man and India move along to 243
a yorker outside off, jabbed towards backward point
fullish ball just outside off, clipped towards long-on for a single
a yorker on the pads to end the over, guided down to long leg for a single
a slow bouncer down the leg side, that is only 66.5mph, Yusuf looks to pull that one but misses out, hit him on the arm and bounces before reaching the keeper

and another wicket for West Indies, Yusuf is gone, it was shortish and wide outside off, Yusuf looked to crash that past point, the extra bounce induces a thin edge and the top edge flies through to the keeper
Russell welcomes Mishra with a bouncer, that is pretty high and down the leg side

Russell is on target this time, and his superb run in the series continues, it was a length ball that Mishra wanted to blast as far as he could after dancing down the track, he fails to connect on the ambitious stroke and the ball takes out off stump, Russell dances in joy
length ball on offstump, punched towards mid-off off the front foot
a bouncer outside off from Russell, that was 85mph, and Vinay leaves that one
short of a length ball just outside off, compact defence from Vinay, what an over from Russell, just the one wide off it
shortish ball on offstump, guided off the back foot towards backward point
that was 87.5mph from Roach, has Vinay feeling for the ball outside off, beats the batsman

dropped, this time Vinay pokes at the short of length ball, gets a healthy edge that Baugh dives to his right to take it, he fluffs the chance, Sammy at first slip was also moving to his left but Baugh dived in front of him
Vinay backs away and swipes that towards deep backward point for a couple, Vinay is off the mark

one more for the West Indies, it was a shortish ball that follows Vinay, who looks to heave that towards midwicket, that is off the glove and bobs up to Baugh, who has to move a few yards to his left to pouch that easy one, Baugh didn't have too long to regret that dropped catch
a good-looking drive off the front foot from Ashwin, he gets a single, leaving Ishant to contend with Russell
shortish ball outside off, Ishant is happy to leave that 85.5mph delivery to the keeper
another short ball from Russell, slides down the leg side and that is a wide

a lovely bowl to take out the tailender, Russell dispenses with the bouncers and slips in a perfect yorker, too good for Ishant, who can't get the bat down in time and the ball homes into the base of offstump, Russell has outstanding figures of 4-35

inn2.comm: short of length on offstump, blocked off the front foot to the off side
looks to whip the ball off the thigh pad towards square leg, misses and is struck on the thigh pad
West Indies get off the mark as Simmons pushes a short of length ball outside off towards point for a single, Vinay bowls at 78mph
Barath's first ball is an outswinger that he shoulders arms to
once again Vinay bowls it outside off, 80.3mph, again Barath is happy to allow it to the keeper
too far outside off to interest Barath, just within the allowed limit
the crowd make plenty of noise as Simmons whacks that wide ball towards deep point, Ishant lucky that poor delivery wasn't hit for four
turns it round the corner for a single, jumping across the stumps to turn the 80.5mph ball to square leg
outside off, and once again Barath is content to leave it for the keeper, 81.6mph
nips in towards Barath, who defends down the track, he races down the track and simultaneously asks Simmons to wait, Barath turns back as well
down the leg side and that is a wide

another poor bit of running, Barath seems anxious to get off the mark as soon as possible, he pushes the ball towards point and sets off for a single, Simmons isn't interested and it would have been curtains if that was a direct hit, luckily for Barath it wasn't
short of length outside off and gets some bounce there, once again Barath leaves the ball
Vinay keeps it nice and tight around off stump, blocked off the front foot towards the off side
keeps it on a length, on offstump, Simmons gets behind the line and defends to the leg side
outside off this time, Simmons looks to drive off the front foot and is beaten, it was a short of length ball
Simmons gets behind the line and punches the ball back towards the bowler, a middle stump ball that was
length ball on offstump, this is good stuff from Vinay, defended to the off side
outside off  once more and that is a maiden as Simmons leaves it to the keeper

dropped, tough chance for Virat Kohli at gully, a rising delivery outside off and the ball hits Barath's bat near the shoulder and popped towards gully, where a diving Kohli couldn't latch on to a head-high chance, Barath gets off the mark
on legstump this time, helped along to fine leg
shortish ball on legstump, defended off the back foot down the track, 85.5mph
sprays it down the leg side
once more Ishant offers Simmons a short and wide delivery, Simmons jumps as he chops that towards deep point for a couple
shortish ball from Ishant, Simmons defends off the back foot to the off side

another drop? very,very difficult chance for Raina at a shortish point, bit of width from Ishant and that was ferociously hit by Simmons, it flies low and to Raina's right, raina gets a hand on it but can't stop that
looks to work the ball towards the leg side, struck on the body and gets leg bye
the end of Simmons, he charges down the track and tries to carve that over the off side, he gets a top edge and slices it down to third man, the in-form opener is gone
length ball on offstump, accurate stuff from Vinay, blocked back down the track
slightly shorter and on middle stump this time, clipped towards midwicket by Sarwan
short of length, on middle and off, blocked from the crease
the final ball of the over is blocked towards point, another maiden for Vinay, he now has superb figures of 3-2-1-1
rising delivery on offstump, Barath pinned on to the back foot, drops the ball in front of point
that was well outside off, lashed towards deep backward point
short of length ball, on middle and off, defended on to his toes
short of length, well outside off moved away a touch, left alone
short of length ball, Sarwan blocks off the front foot towards the off side
same length, just outside off, defended towards cover, this has been a bright start from the Indian bowlers
length ball outside off, pushed out towards cover
short of length ball on offstump, more careful defence towards the off side
keeps pegging away at the offstump, tapped back down the pitch
the string of dot balls from Vinay is over, Barath guides that one down to third man for a single
length ball on legstump, clipped behind square leg for a single, Sarwan is off the mark
length ball on middle stump, turned towards square leg
angling in towards off stump, blocked to the off side  by Barath
short of length ball outside off, defended from the crease towards cover
short of length and outside off, blocked towards cover
pulled away by Sarwan, it was a short ball that was superbly put away, swivels as he plays that stylish stroke
length ball outside off and Sarwan plays a good-looking drive past extra cover, the timing wasn't perfect so the ball doesn't go all the way
another short ball outside off, Sarwan attempts the pull again, he can't connect
length ball is punched towards mid-off off the front foot
length ball on off stump, Barath shuffles across and tucks it behind square leg
short ball on offstump, defended towards square leg, Sarwan takes the bottom hand off the bat as he plays that
length ball on the legstump, carefully defended towards mid-on
short of length and angling in, jabbed towards cover by Sarwan, off the back foot
length ball on middle stump, Sarwan leans across and clips the ball towards midwicket
straighter one on offstump. punched back to the bowler
slightly wide outside off, Sarwan chops that to backward point
firmly hit towards cover off the back foot, can't beat the fielder
again the gap proves elusive, slapped towards backward point this time
overpitched on middle and off, and after starting with four dot balls, he gives away a boundary, Sarwan gets forward and thumps it through the leg side, wide of mid-on for four
blocked towards point to end the over
slightly overpitched and heading down leg, off the pads towards square leg
bludgeoned, Sarwan backs away to make room and hammers a short ball over extra cover for four
angles this into the pads, clipped behind square leg for a single
shortish ball that was going to sail over the stumps, Barath wanted to clip that to square leg but the ball drops at his feet
Ishant sends this in at 83.2mph, well outside off, slapped towards deep point
once more some extra bounce, drops the ball towards point
tossed up by Mishra, gets some turn for his effort, slightly overpitched on legstump, turns towards off, defended
more defence from the batsman, towards the off side
length ball pitching just outside off, blocked towards point
Mishra gets this one to zip past the outside edge, spins away sharply after pitching on a length around off
on the last ball Barath lunged forward, but this time he decided to wait on the back foot and guided the ball towards third man

not the prettiest of shots from Barath, he flat bats the last ball of the over towards long-on for a boundary, it hasn't been very easy for Barath in the middle, that shot should release some pressure
just short of a length and heading for off, blocked towards mid-on
again keeps it around off, blocked to the leg side
a touch shorter, not much turn on offer so far for Ashwin, tapped back to the bowler
tossed up and a bit of turn for Ashwin, it was well outside off, Barath went forward and looked to drive that but is beaten
watchful defence towards the off side
ends the over with a block to the leg side
length ball on offstump, guided towards point and a tight single is pinched
flighted ball from Mishra, batsman was expecting some legspin there, it hits him on the pad as he looks to defend, off the pad towards short fine
Sarwan comes down the track to smash the ball over long-on, can't connetc properly, inside-edged towards square leg
the wrong Ãºn, Barath was looking to defend, he is beaten on the front foot, and there is an appeal for lbw as the ball spins past his bat, struck outside the off though
tossed up and on the off, Barath blocks it on the offside
dropped by Kohli at slip, Barath was cramped by that one and still went for the cut, just gets it off the face of the bat towards slip, where Kohli had a chance low to his left, can't hang on
another chance, tough one this, Ashwin spins this in towards Sarwan who looks for his favourite cut, over Kohli at slip
on the pads, clipped to the leg side for a couple

that could have been a run-out, down the leg side and Parthiv can't collect, Barath sets off for the run, but the fielder was onto it very quickly, Barath would have been a goner if that was a direct hit, even if the throw to Parthiv had been slightly better
blocked towards the off side by Barath
was that the carrom ball? defended to the off side by Barath
carefully defended to the leg side
this one comes in, he tries to flick but can't connect and takes it on the pads
tossed up very generously, he goes for the drive but right to extra cover

Mishra gets his man, it was the wrong 'un, Barath came forward, it dipped on him and turned in to strike him on the pad as Barath pushed way outside the line, umpire thinks there is no doubt about it, Barath's struggles are over
flighted ball full around off he comes forward and smothers it
gets the inside edge as he comes forward to one that turns in sharply, no harm done though
slower through the air and he gets forward to defend on the leg side
gets behind the line of a straighter ball and pushes it back to the bowler
goes back to a length ball going straight on and plays it towards midwicket
lets it turn in from outside off and pushes it on the off side
goes back to one turning in and punches through extra cover
tossed up full but down the leg side and he picks it to deep square leg to get off the mark
played out towards midwicket
not much turn for Ashwin, he makes room by backing away and cuts to sweeper cover
works it away by going on the back foot and picks up a single in front of square leg
pushed away to extra cover off the front foot
work for sweeper cover as Darren makes room and cuts through point
worked away off a fuller length on the pad down to long on
almost did him in here, it was the one hurrying on, did not get up much, Sarwan poked at it from the crease and got an inside edge that somehow missed the stumps
pushed wide of extra cover for a single
nicely bowled, slower through the air,has him reaching for it and turns in past the edge
does not commit forward and plays it out to point
now tries to walk down the track, Ashwin shortens the length and he plays it with the turn to midwicket
fuller ball but he cannot get it away, drives it back to the bowler
gets outside the line of this one to flick for a single through square leg
but ends up on leg stump with the angle and is taken for a single in front of square
superb googly, has him prodding with no clue, pitches leg and zips past the outside edge
played away towards midwicket
tossed up ball he gets around it to nudge with the turn on the leg side
pushes forward and gets the single behind square on the off side, Virat's horror day in the field gets scarier, he throws exactly in the center of the pitch, and between the men trying to back up
gets an inside edge onto pad as he pushes forward
gets behind the line of one around middle and leg to defend off the front foot
tossed up around middle and leg and played away towards midwicket
throws it up outside off and lures him in to a loose drive, turns away to beat him
cramps him for room with one fired in full, driven back to the bowler
super stuff from Ashwin, tossed up and has him driving loosely again, the turn induces an edge that falls short of point
leaves this one alone outside off stump as it spits away
goes back to quietly play it out on the leg side, excellent over from Ashwin
and serves up a half-tracker first ball, he goes back to pull it forcefully over midwicket, long on gets around to it
another half-tracker, turning in slowly and he whacks it over midwicket again, this time to deep midwicket
dropped India can't hold on to anything at the moment, goes back to run it down to third man, in to Parthiv's gloves and out of them, tough chance though
pushes it away down the ground for one
stays in the crease to push one bowled from round the stumps towards midwicket
goes for the front foot drive from outside off and gets a single in front of cover
tossed up and goes wide down leg, PArthiv cannot collect cleanly
another one tossed up down the pads, but he he puts bat to this one and gets it through square leg
smack! Windies target the fifth bowler, and collect four, Sarwan goes down on a knee and slog-sweeps him from way outside off stump and wide of deep midwicket
pushed away down the track
does not get up much, he makes room to chop it to sweeper cover
pushed away behind point off the front foot
tossed up and he gets behind the line to block it back to the bowler
India's standards in the field are plummeting by the minute, turning in from a length, chopped towards third man, who lets rip a baseball pitch that beats everyone to go for four overthrows
pushed down the track from the crease
loud appeal for lbw, he came forward and was struck on the pads as he missed the one angled in, was it outside the line, bat and pad were close together too
pushed away with an open face behind point
the carrom ball, but he reads it off the pitch and defends it on the off side
more overthrows, India's fielding is all over the place, nudged towards short fine leg and the throw is wild
turning away from around off, punched away towards covers
wayward ball turning in down leg, and he helps it along as it gathers pace down the slope, long leg will get to it though
India manage a direct hit, would you believe it, but the batsman is home, it was a tight single pinched in front of square leg

once it gets down that slope there is no chance for the man in the circle, thick outside edge  as Darren looks to force off the back foot, short third man runs all the way to the boundary along with it
pushed back to the bowler
tossed up ball and he stretches forward to defend
Virat plods in at gentle medium pace and is punched down to long off
given wide after a lot of consideration, batsman had missed the fine nudge as it was bowled down leg
pushed down to long on off the front foot
waits for it to slowly come on and whips it to deep midwicket
pushed away on the leg side
loopy length ball on the pads and he wristliy whips to long on
shuffles to work one away to Pathan at short fine leg, can;t get the single
gets forward and pushes in front of square leg, Parthiv goes after it
fired in on middle and straightening, pushed back to the bowler
takes it off middle stump as he walks across and flicks to long leg
looks to back away and help it past short third man but can't time it
turning down leg and Sarwan whacks it dismissively to deep backward square leg
gets forward to push to the bowler, fine tight over from Raina this time
goes for a forcing pull but it comes very slowly off the track and he gets it in the air to deep midwikcet
struck on the pads as he misses on the flick, that pitched outside leg but that is not the first time DArren has had this problem
gets to the pitch of a length ball to drive to long off
allows a loopy flighted on to come on and pushes on the off side
neat work from the bowler, gets across and dives to his right to stop the ball pushed down the track
the part-timers get away with another miserly over as only a run results from Sarwan;s whip across the line to deep midwicket
gets to his 50, third of the series, with a drive with the turn to long on
smacked hard off the back foot as this one pitches short, sweeper cover fields
drives a fuller ball with the turn to long on
Rohit saves two, or even four, with a screaming leap to his right at point, that slash from Darren was travelling
fired down the leg side from round the sstumps
another one down the leg side with the angle
misses this one that turns away outside off stump and has him driving from the crease
once again Raina fires it down leg and he gets a nudge on it but long leg rushes to his left to keep them to one,
flicked nicely off the pads but right to square leg
sends in one on leg stump and this time he plays it in front of square leg
shuffles across and works for a run to short fine leg
shuffles and eases in to a drive down to long on off a fuller ball
Sarwan gets a very full delivery outside off and flows in to a cover drive for a run
cut off the back foot to sweeper cover
Raina dives to his right to parry a drive to extra cover
getting tied down as he pushes another full ball back to Raina
outside edge, there is no one at slip though as Darren reaches for one turning away, short third man dives and fields to his right
gets forward to fetch another single, this one in front of point
cracked off the back foot to the man at sweeper cover
short midwicket is there and he cuts off a work with the turn by Sarwan
goes back to plonk a back of a length ball in front of cover and gets across for the run, even as there is a direct hit from Raina at the striker's
backs away but does nothing in the end as Ishant angles it in and he ends up just poking inside the line
looks to force it through point, Ishant gets lots of bounce and some inward movement, and Sarwan is beaten again
meanwhile Sarwan plays it out on the leg side
hangs in the crease expecting the back of a length ball, but it is on a length and he manages to push it to sweeper cover
another dot ball, the asking rate it about to touch seven and a half
gets the first one away, comes down the track and lofts with the turn wide of deep midwicket
slog-sweep, gets him six, even better, goes down on the knee and smacks it in to the crowd
better ball from Raina, a touch shorter and turning in, he is cramped and can't do much
nudges off the pads for a single to short fine leg
Darren continues to inhabit another world, where even Raina's harmless deliveries are treated with respect, comes down the track and blocks it back to the bowler
gets a single this time through point off the back foot
Darren survives, looks to hang back and force him through covers, but the thick  edge eludes little Parthiv's dive to his left and crashes in to the boundary
the tennis forehand brings him another four, just stays in the crease and slams it past a surprised Ishant, no chance for mid off
front foot goes out and bat comes down dead straight and the ball is smothered in defence, after getting two boundaries he can afford to do that
he even leaves alone one going across outside off stump, hmm
has him going back and pushing at one close to off stump, takes the edge and flies past backward point
allows a length ball to come in at an angle and works it through midwicket, productive over for the Windies, they can ponder about it over drinks now
full delivery and an inside edge as he looks to drive, picks up a single towards square leg
good shot from Darren, gets to the pitch of a wider one outside off and drives it in the air, but well to the left of point
gets easily on top of the short ball and pulls it away through midwicket, hobbles after playing the shot
cuts away from around middle, he tries to dab it past point but cannot beat the man
succeeds in his attempt this time, gets a widish one past point and third man fields
Vinay appeals for lbw, he was shuffling across, missed and took it on the pads, looked like it was headed down the leg side
cuts a turning ball off the back foot to sweeper cover
tossed up slower through the air, he uncertainly tries to nudge it away and misses
turning down the leg side and he goes down on a knee to help it towards long leg
lots of bounce as he tries to punch with the turn through extra cover
Sarwan is really struggling too much, gets forward with effort and tucks him through square leg
flat delivery bowled full on the stumps and he pushes it back to the bowler
it's all happening, Sarwan almost plays on, Vinay rushes forward, Simmons hesitates, Bravo has already reached the other end, Simmons tries to get across, Vinay throws, and misses, ho hum
pushed away towards cover, Rohit dives to prevent the single
steered away from the crease to third man
lovely drive from the struggling Sarwan, stands tall and with a big followthrough sends it down to long off
brings up the 100 stand with a hoick that a diving midwicket stops
stays beside the line and opens the face to guide a length ball to point,
reaches out to a widish ball turning further away and whacks it past extra cover for a couple, India's continuing generosity almost allows one more
pushed away towards point
can't get it away again, throws his bat at one turning away outside off, falls short of point
going straight on, he had set himself up for the cut and guides it to point in the end
another dot ball, pushed back to the bowler off the back foot
Sarwan's struggles are starting to hurt his team, he does not have the power to punch a shortish ball away, gets it only towards extra cover
charges out but Ashwin beats him with one tossed up and coming in with the angle, he takes it on the pads even as he looks to loft it over midwicket
gets the single on the leg side to bring Samuels on strike
Parthiv cannot pick up the ball pushed on the off side else the tight single could have been dangerous as well for Windies
tight from Ashwin, on middle and he guides it with the turn to short third man
Darren manages to get one away, down the track, close to the pitch and the swing sends it soaring over wide long on
having got the six, he just defends a full delivery on the leg side
swing and a miss from Samuels, Ishant gets lift from a length and Marlon can;t connect as he wants to cut
looks to carve him over mid off, but is not to the pitch of the length ball, and ends up hitting on the up to mid off
they get the single, drops it in front of point and off they go through
would have been a wide down leg had he not got bat to it to pick up a single to long leg, which gets him to his 50
pushing for the second but they will get only the single as deep midwicket converges on the ball that is nudged away on the leg side
very full delivery outside off stump, he tries to get down on a knee and squeeze it past point but misses
has no clue about the one going straight on as he takes it on the pads trying to work it away on the leg side
another carrom ball, Samuels cannot much other than block it back to Ashwin
one more straighter one which Samuels works on the leg side  but still no run
he hasnt bowled the off break in this over so far and another one turning away is cut to sweeper cover from outside off
Darren still cannot it away, comes down the track but is cramped totally by the one coming in to him
and again, superb stuff from Ashwin, looks to give him the charge but has no clue about how to tackle the variations of Ashwin, tamely pushed in to the off side
works a length ball off the pads in front of square leg, a single is all he gets
Darren can't seem to get anything away at the moment, length ball which he tries to nudge around for one, but Ishant does not allow even that with a dive to his left
this is a struggle, and it does not seem to end, just acquires newer dimensions, that full ball in the blockhole outside off and he cannot connect, yet again
digs out the yorker and gets it to extra cover who throws but India can't find the stumps today
the dot count just keeps rising all the time, Ishant has hit a nice rhythm as he targets the blockhole close to off to beat Samuels
attempted yorker turns in to a very low full toss and Samuels makes room to carve it past point, picks up a couple, the boundaries aren;t coming
gets the cut away off the back foot but Rohit has been good today at backward point, runs to his right and puts in the dive
the carrom ball and he checks his lofted shot to push for a single to long on
Darren's painful troubles continue, he looks to give him the charge, but is cramped by the one angled in and he can't do anything with it
gets it away, fuller delivery tossed up and Darren lofts it with a big followthrough over wide long on like he did a few overs ago
another one and suddenly the crowd comes to life, full again and Darren slog sweeps this time way over deep midwikcet
bowls it slower through the air and as it turns away he opens the face to get the single to short third man
backs away and cuts a flatter ball but cover fields with a dive
almost yorks himself as he comes out to a tossed up ball around leg stump
horror ball from Mishra, high full toss, high enough to be called no-ball, and down the leg side, Darren swivels and thumps it over deep square leg

make that one more, Darren is making India pay now for all that generosity in the field, just goes down on a knee and sweeps, the connection is so good that it seems to have carried all the way, or does it, given six after some replays
Mishra helps Windies further by bowling a wide down the leg side
pushed away off the front foot in front of covers
Mishra fires one in from round the stumps on the pads and is picked away for a single through square leg
Samuels defends off the front foot, Windies have targetted India;s frontline spinners in the last two overs, 15 off each over

dropped it is Rohit Sharma, it was a very tough chance, poor ball from vinay, high full toss outside off that Darren whacked wide of Rohit at midwicket, who went leaping to his right and got a hand to it, batsmen got in to a mess trying the second but the throw was at the wrong end
the slower one arrives from Vinay, Samuels plonks it towards point to bring Darren on strike

clatter! Darren Bravo is looking better and better now, and is not even trying too hard, just gets front leg out of the way and eases in to a big swing, pick up that ball from beyond the wide long off boundary
full toss on the stumps and Darren is cross that he did not make use of the gift, inside edge to short fine leg as he looks to clobber it over midwicket
backs away and squeezes a full ball past point and they will come back for the second
Vinay gets away with another full toss, Samuels swings from the crease and gets an edge that rolls away towards Parthiv

have they got him, yes they have, it was the flighted wrong 'un, darren reached out as it left him outside off, front foot got dragged out of the crease, and the toe remained on the line even as Parthiv whipped off the bails, this match has turned again, he is disappointed as he walks back
flatter ball hurries on to Pollard who manages to push it towards vacant midwicket and gets back for two as Mishra goes after the ball
goes well forward to defend a turning delivery back towards the bowler
the wrong 'un, the shortish length lured Pollard in to going for the big pull, it turned in to take an inside edge and go behind the wicket
that will be four, it is going downhill fine down the leg side, Mishra tosses it up down Pollard's pads who flicks it fine past short fine leg
turns away even as he pushes forward to guide it towards point
pulls away one turning on leg stump and picks up a couple backward of square leg
flat delivery on the pads and he can't get it past midwicket
bowls it way down the pads and he happily flicks it in front of square leg
tossed up slowly through the air, and goes straight on as Pollard pushes forward uncertainly
length ball, does not get up much, he makes room and gives it a big thump, scoots down the ground, long on puts in the dive, to no avail
gets outside the line of this one to earn a wide down leg
well forward in defence to smother the last ball of the Powerplay, brought Windies 57 runs, India managed 33
crash! Vinay runs in and bowls a length ball and disappears in to the sightscreen, Samuels makes room and lofts him as straight as possible, bounces just inside the rope
West Indies doing it in boundaries, Samuels throws his bat at a length ball outside off. thick edge flies past a diving third man
slower one, he goes hard at it again but manages only the single down to long off
clobber! this is silken murder, this is effortless carnage, stands motionless in the crease, shifts weight back and lifts a full toss with a swift and brutal swing way over deep midwicket
reaches out and thumps a widish ball but cannot beat a diving extra cover
Samuels gets another boundary, vinay has just fallen away here, making room again and slicing it standing feet wide apart, over short third man, almost home now
stays beside the line and chops it past point to third man for a single
scores are level now with a front foot drive wide of mid off, the horns are blaring
Pollard tries to help a short ball over the keeper but cannot connect
that will be it for the Windies, Pollard backs away and swings hard, mid on dives over the ball and West Indies have made it 3-2
